document.docAuthor: Malagón-Aldana, Leonardo A., Smith, David R., Vilhelmsen, Lars & Serna, Francisco
document.masterDocTitle: The sawflies and woodwasps (Hymenoptera: ‘ Symphyta’) of Colombia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The sawflies and woodwasps (Hymenoptera: ‘ Symphyta’) of Colombia

subSubSection.paragraph:
P. lacourti Smith, 1990
( Fig. 22 a-d): French Guiana (Smith 1990), COLOMBIA .
Huila
, Cabaña Cedros, PNN Cueva de Los Guácharos, 1950m , 1°37’N , 76°06’W , malaise trap, 20 April 2003 , C. Cortés leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH- E-151300). Same data, 06 March 2002 , J. Fonseca leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E- 151299 ). Huila , Cueva del Indio, PNN Cueva de Los Guácharos, 1990m , 1°37’N , 76°06’W , malaise trap, 28 November 2001 , D. Campos leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149419).
Risaralda
, Cuchilla Camino, SFF Otún Quimbaya , 1960m , 4°44’N , 75°35’W , malaise trap, 04 April 2003 , G. López leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149414). Same data, 11 October 2003 , G. López leg., 4 spec. , (IAvH-E- 151293 to 151296 ). Same data, 26 September 2003 , G. López leg., 2 spec. , (IAvH-E-151302 and IAvH-E- 151297 ). Same data, 2050m , 4°43’N , 75°35’W , malaise trap, 30 March 2004 , G. López leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E- 151298 ). Risaralda , El Molinillo, SFF Otún Quimbaya , 2220m , 4°43’N , 75°34’W , malaise trap, 10 September 2003 , G. López leg., 2 spec. , (IAvH-E-139505; IAvH-E-151313). Same data, 11 August 2003 , G. López leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH- E-151301). Same data, 17 February 2003 , G. López leg., 2 spec. , (IAvH-E-149415 and IAvH-E-149421). Same data, 21 March 2003 , G. López leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-149417).
Valle del Cauca
, Jamundí , Cgto. La Meseta, PNN Farallones de Cali, 1960m , 3°34’N , 76°40’W , malaise trap, 10 September 2003 , S. Sarria M. Losso leg., 18 spec. , (IAvH-E-149407 to 149413; IAvH-E-149416; IAvH-E-149418; IAvH-E-149420; IAvH-E-149422 to 149429). Valle del Cauca , Jamundí , Cgto. La Meseta (Cabecera), la Selva, PNN Farallones, 2200m , 3°11’N , 76°36’W , malaise trap, 15 September 2005 , S. Sarria M. Lasso leg., 1 spec. , (IAvH-E-139507; IAvH-E-151304).

Comments: The color patterns in
Perreyiella
seem to be highly variable. Some specimens previously identified as
P. nigra
, with completely black coloration, were reassigned to
P. lacourti
, since when extracting the genitalia from some males we found characteristic basiparameres (= gonostipes) with parapenis lobes absent ( Fig. 22c ); this observation shows that color variation in
P. lacourti
overlaps that of other species. In addition, the antennae of the females are not only filiform as described previously, but can be serrated with the flagellomere broadening distally.
